'''Kaeya Alberich''' is a playable {{Cryo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Kaeya is the Cavalry Captain of the [[Knights of Favonius]]. He is held in high regard by the people of [[Mondstadt]] &mdash; even with all his eccentricities and secrets.

He is obtained for free in the {{Quest|Crash Course}}.
